translation.en: a fascination for an Internet meme known as the Crooked Man.
translation.ja: “行方不明の若者２人が 夢中になってたのは⸺” “歪み男の画像だった”

translation.en: There's gotta be at least 50 stories here: Suicides, homicides, disappearances.
translation.ja: 自殺や殺人 失踪が 少なくとも50件は載ってる

translation.en: Crooked Man Uncovered?
The original site was taken down.
translation.ja: 元のサイトは削除されたけど

translation.en: But according to this, a lot of people had recited that rhyme.
translation.ja: 元のサイトは削除されたけど その歌を歌った人は 何人もいたみたい

translation.en: I thought maybe there might be some information on how to stop this thing.
translation.ja: 止める方法も 載ってるかと思ったけど

translation.en: Unfortunately, there's no contact information listed or anything.
translation.ja: サイト主の情報は どこにも書かれてなかった

translation.en: - I have an idea. Come on. - Where are we going?
translation.ja: 考えがある どこへ？

translation.en: - The Crooked Man? - You've heard of it?
Internet meme that kills people?
So can you find whoever put up that website or not?
translation.ja: そのサイトを 作ったヤツを探したい

translation.en: All you have to do is put the domain into a Whois search, and you should get what you need.
translation.ja: ドメインで調べれば 見つけられるかと

translation.en: Got a P.O. box in Leveritt.
translation.ja: レバレットの私書箱だ

translation.en: No name?
Looks like whoever did this wanted their privacy.
translation.ja: 素性を隠したいらしい

translation.en: But that should be pretty easy for you to trace, right?
translation.ja: だが追跡なんて朝飯前だろ

translation.en: I thought you said this was going to be hard. We're cyber forensics. We can do anything.
translation.ja: サイバー捜査班を なめられちゃ困る

translation.en: All I have to do is go into the system, find out who registered the box, and...
translation.ja: システムに入れば 私書箱の登録者なんて…

translation.en: It's been abandoned for three years.
- Great. - So back to square one?
Wait.
What-- What are you doing?
Most computers automatically imprint their files with a level of metadata, such as who created them and where.
translation.ja: ほとんどの場合 データ作成者に関する情報は

translation.en: Kinda like a fingerprint.
translation.ja: ファイルに残されてる

translation.en: So, for example, if the site has any photos,
translation.ja: 例えばサイトの写真から

translation.en: I can find out where the computer was that posted them.
translation.ja: 投稿された場所は特定できる

translation.en: Thanks.
- You can't leave now! - Look, Olive...
translation.ja: 行かないで オリビア

translation.en: I'm sorry I told everyone you were crazy, and I'm sorry I didn't support you all those years ago,
translation.ja: あなたの話を 信じなかったのは謝るけど

translation.en: but I am not going to sit around and wait to die!
This guy maybe will have some answers for us.
translation.ja: 止めるヒントが 見つかったかも

translation.en: Is that gonna help Jill or Jill's mom or Mia?
translation.ja: それでジルや ミアが生き返るの？

translation.en: All gassed up!
Violet's not coming.
translation.ja: バイオレットが抜けると

translation.en: What do you mean, she's not coming? We had a plan.
translation.ja: 何で？　計画があるのよ

translation.en: What if you're wrong? What if you can't stop it?
You think running will help?
I do know staying here won't.
Come with me. You don't need to be a part of this.
translation.ja: 協力する必要なんてない

translation.en: Yes, I do. We've been hiding too long.
translation.ja: ダメよ ここで終わらせないと

translation.en: - It's your funeral. - Violet...
translation.ja: お別れね バイオレット

translation.en: Violet.
Be careful. Please?
translation.ja: 気を付けて　お願い

translation.en: You too.
- Alice! - Olive.
What are you doing?
Alice!
- - Grab my hand!
- Olivia, what are you doing here? - I need to talk to you.
translation.ja: ここで何を？ 話したい

translation.en: You need to leave. It's not safe.
translation.ja: 帰った方がいい　危ないわ

translation.en: Alice... what happened?
translation.ja: アリス 何があったの？

translation.en: Please go.
Not until I talk to you first. It's important.
translation.ja: 嫌よ　大事な話なの

translation.en: These drawings...
You can't just come in here and go through my stuff.
- Alice! - It's private!
translation.ja: アリス 見ないでよ

translation.en: Alice, you're not alone.
I've seen them too.
We're being warned.
Look, there's a site I found. Dozens of cases just like ours.
translation.ja: 私たちと同じ事例が サイトに山ほど載ってた

translation.en: - The Crooked Man? - Yes.
Noah had a friend at the police station track down whoever put the site up.
translation.ja: サイトを作った人物を 探してもらったの

translation.en: If they've been doing all the research, then- then maybe they know how to stop it.
translation.ja: 調べ尽くしてきた人物なら 止める方法を知ってるかも

translation.en: It's too late.
This is why I need you to come with me.
translation.ja: だから一緒に来てほしい

translation.en: - I can't. - Alice...
Mother says never leave the house without her.
People are dying!
She says I'm safe here.
Do you believe her?
Alice...
this could be our chance to finally fix what we did.
translation.ja: 過ちを正す最後の機会なの

translation.en: We can make things right.
I get carsick.
We'll crack a window. Come on.
Olivia? You saw something, didn't you?
translation.ja: オリビア　何か見たのね

translation.en: Olivia?
It's over here.
Hello?
Is anyone there?
Anybody?
- What are you doing here? -
- Olivia. - How do you know my name?
translation.ja: オリビア なぜ私の名前を？

translation.en: You're very lucky.
Not many people have come face to face with the Crooked Man and survived.
translation.ja: 歪み男に会えば ほとんどが死ぬ

translation.en: You know about that?
Of course.
That's why you're here, isn't it? To find someone who can give you all the answers.
translation.ja: その答えを求めて ここに来たんだろ？

translation.en: Let's start with what this thing is and where it came from.
translation.ja: まずはヤツの正体を教えて

translation.en: In the 1800s,
a writer researching legends and folklore
translation.ja: 1800年代のことだ 伝説や伝承を研究する作家が 発見したんだ

translation.en: discovered dozens of different cultures
translation.ja: 伝説や伝承を研究する作家が 発見したんだ

translation.en: in dozens of different languages, all referring to the same thing.
translation.ja: 多様な文化間に 共通する存在をね

translation.en: He called it the Crooked Man.
translation.ja: それを“歪み男”と呼んだ

translation.en: Imagine a death sentence that no mortal could escape,
translation.ja: 誰にも逃れられない 死刑宣告だと⸺

translation.en: that no human law could pardon,
the eternal, unstoppable force bringing certain death to anyone who dare summon it.
translation.ja: 召喚した者は止める術(すべ)もなく 必ず死を迎える

translation.en: It probably started as an tribal incantation.
translation.ja: 起源は部族の呪文だろう

translation.en: A curse.
The words were translated and passed down through the ages, evolving with the times.
translation.ja: それが翻訳され 代々 受け継がれていった

translation.en: Over the years, it was transcribed and studied.
translation.ja: そして長い年月をかけて 研究され⸺

translation.en: Part of it was even turned into a nursery rhyme.
Eventually someone put it online.
translation.ja: やがてネット上で公開され

translation.en: And with that, the proverbial Pandora's Box was out there.
translation.ja: そのパンドラの箱が 開いてしまったんだ

translation.en: The Crooked Man now belonged to the world.
translation.ja: 歪み男は もはや世界中に存在する

translation.en: You were the one that put it up on Creepyhollow.
translation.ja: あのサイトを作ったでしょ

translation.en: Funny thing about the Internet.
translation.ja: ネットの面白いところは

translation.en: You can take down content, but it never really goes away.
translation.ja: ページを消しても 完全には消えない

translation.en: By the time I realized what was happening, that... that the Crooked Man was real,
translation.ja: 気づいた頃には既に 歪み男が現実となってた

translation.en: it was too late.
I tried to get back online to warn people.
translation.ja: 警鐘を鳴らそうとした

translation.en: Four people in our town are dead!
translation.ja: この町で４人も死んでる

translation.en: And not a minute goes by where I'm not tormented by what I did.
translation.ja: 自分がしたことを ずっと悔やみ続けてる

translation.en: I'm up in that sanctuary every day,
translation.ja: 毎日 犠牲者に祈ることで

translation.en: praying for the souls of the people I killed.
translation.ja: 許された気持ちになれる

translation.en: Now, ever since I came back...
The Crooked Man returned.
Why?
When you left, somehow you... you paused the curse.
translation.ja: 君が去った時 なぜか呪いは一度止まった

translation.en: But now that you're back,
now that all who were marked have returned and reunited,
translation.ja: 標的にされてた人たちが 再会した

translation.en: it's like you never left.
I tried to warn you.
I tried to get you to leave before he returned.
translation.ja: 先に君を追い出すためだ

translation.en: What are you talking about?
- The rock. - That was you.
translation.ja: 石だよ “消え失せろ オリビア” あなたの仕業ね “消え失せろ オリビア”

translation.en: But now it's too late.
What if she left again?
Too many people have died now.
He's coming for you.
There's no order, no rhyme, no reason.
translation.ja: 規則性も何の理由もない

translation.en: Where there's darkness, he will be there.
translation.ja: ただ暗闇のある所に ヤツは存在する

translation.en: But there has to be a way to stop him, right?
translation.ja: 止める方法はあるはず

translation.en: You can't.
He cannot be stopped.
You cannot hide,
and you cannot run.
If you have been cursed by the Crooked Man,
translation.ja: 歪み男の呪いに かかったら⸺

translation.en: he will kill you eventually,
no matter what.
Keep it down!
Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name,
translation.ja: 天国にまします我らの父よ

translation.en: thy kingdom come, thy will be done--
I- I thought you were sleeping.
- There's something I have to do. - Wait. Hey, where--
translation.ja: 出かける 待て　どこへ…

translation.en: ♪ Upon your potter's field ♪
♪ Only with this crooked song ♪
Wait a minute.
No way.
Classical fairy tales?
translation.ja: 昔のおとぎ話に 古代神話？

translation.en: - Ancient mythology? - Noah.
translation.ja: 昔のおとぎ話に 古代神話？ ノア

translation.en: Your dad said you'd be here.
- What's wrong? - Can we go talk?
Yeah, of course.
Noah, what is it?
Noah, how do you have this?
Noah.
I have to tell you something...
about when we were kids.
What?
The night of the sleepover? The night Jill died?
translation.ja: ジルが死んだ夜 あのお泊まり会の場に⸺

translation.en: I was there.
My sister was supposed to be there.
I was on my way home from basketball practice, and I thought-- I thought I'd swing by and give 'em a little scare, you know.
translation.ja: バスケの練習の帰りに 驚かそうと寄ったんだ

translation.en: But by the time I got there, I realized she wasn't there. It was too late.
translation.ja: 行って初めて 妹がいないことに気づいた

translation.en: And then when the lights went off, I got so scared that I would be seen, so I left.
translation.ja: 見られたらマズいと思って 逃げたんだ

translation.en: I'm screwed, aren't I?
Noah, I am so sorry. I had no idea.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい　知らなかった

translation.en: But it's gonna be OK now, right? Because you figured out where the website came from,
translation.ja: サイトの出どころは分かった

translation.en: so you're gonna make it stop.
Not quite.
That's encouraging.
But I'm working on it.
So I am screwed.
Hey.
We're gonna fix this, OK?
I promise.
Yeah.
Noah, what is it?
You really don't see that.
It's him, isn't it?
What is he doing?
He's trying to get us...
translation.ja: 俺たちを捕まえようと

translation.en: but he can't.
translation.ja: でも できないみたいだ

translation.en: It's the light.
As long as we stay out of the dark, we should be OK.
translation.ja: 暗闇を避ければ大丈夫

translation.en: He's gone.
Come on. I have an idea.
Only with this crooked song shall the Crooked Man yield.
translation.ja: “歪み男の歌でのみ 封じられる”

translation.en: At first, I thought it was talking about the rhyme itself.
translation.ja: 初めは詩だと思ってたの

translation.en: Yeah?
But what if it literally means song?
translation.ja: でも文字通り “歌”のことだとしたら？

translation.en: What if this music box is the key to the whole thing?
translation.ja: このオルゴールが すべてのカギなら？

translation.en: Milo said there was a writer in the 1800s who was doing research on old legends
translation.ja: 昔の伝承を研究してた 1800年代の作家が

translation.en: and found out about the Crooked Man.
He found the music box, and he accidentally summoned the Crooked Man.
translation.ja: そのオルゴールで 誤って召喚したのか？

translation.en: If this box is out there,
translation.ja: このオルゴールがあれば⸺

translation.en: we might be able to stop this thing.
All we have to do is find it.
What is it?
We have to turn around. Now.
Anything?
Voicemail.
- Hope we're not too late. - Come on!
See you soon, Olivia.
translation.ja: また会おう　オリビア

translation.en: She didn't do anything.
Oh, I forgot.
It's the boogeyman, right?
Son, a word.
Olivia and I have been together the whole time.
translation.ja: ずっと一緒にいたんだ

translation.en: Five people are dead, Noah.
She left three suicide notes.
translation.ja: シャーロットは遺書を

translation.en: You saw the body. You think she did that to herself?
translation.ja: 遺体を見ても自殺だと？

translation.en: Not exactly.
Please tell me you're not drinking the fruit punch.
- I know it sounds crazy. - You are a police officer.
translation.ja: 変な話だけど… お前は警官だ

translation.en: - I know what I saw! - OK. Here's what's gonna happen.
translation.ja: 見たんだよ さあ やるぞ

translation.en: - You're not listening. - You're gonna take her down
translation.ja: 彼女を警察署へ連行しろ

translation.en: - to the police station, OK? - You're gonna arrest her?
translation.ja: 彼女を警察署へ連行しろ ここを片づけたら 私も行く

translation.en: I'm gonna come down there and talk to her as soon as I'm done here.
translation.ja: ここを片づけたら 私も行く

translation.en: Do you want me to have somebody else do this?
No.
How could she have felt so helpless?
translation.ja: なぜ あきらめたんだろう

translation.en: I'm sorry.
What are you doing?
I have no choice.
- Noah! - Don't make a scene.
- You can't do this! - Just get in the car, please.
translation.ja: 間違ってる とにかく車へ

translation.en: This is 4- 30. Suspect in custody. 10- 7 to station.
translation.ja: 現在 容疑者を署に連行中だ

translation.en: Copy that, Noah.
What are you doing?
Noah!
Shh! We're alone now.
We got about 20 minutes until my father realizes where we're going.
translation.ja: 父さんが気づくまで20分ある

translation.en: I'm sorry.
So where do we go now?
Looks like a place a professor would live.
Well, it's always nice to meet some of dad's former students.
translation.ja: 父の教え子なら いつでも歓迎よ

translation.en: He always spoke so highly of you and your mom.
translation.ja: “自慢の家族だ”と 言ってましたよ

translation.en: I thought, since we happened to be in the area, that we should pay our respects.
translation.ja: 偶然 近くまで来たから あいさつしていこうかと

translation.en: Oh, you found Milo, I see.
translation.ja: マイロは知ってるでしょ

translation.en: He was my dad's teaching assistant for years.
translation.ja: ずっと父の助手をしてた

translation.en: Which-- which class of his did you take again?
translation.ja: 何の授業を受けてたと？

translation.en: World Culture and Mythology.
Yeah. That was one of his favorites.
translation.ja: その授業は父も大好きだった

translation.en: - Sugar? - No, thank you.
He always would tell the most interesting stories.
translation.ja: 教授がしてくれる話は すごく面白くて

translation.en: He would make you feel like you were right in the middle of it all.
translation.ja: のめり込んで聞いてました

translation.en: It must've been amazing, growing up with a father like that, all the stories he must have had.
translation.ja: そんな環境で育ったなんて うらやましいです

translation.en: To tell you the truth, yeah, he saved most of that for his students.
translation.ja: 話は全部 学生のために 取っておいてたみたい

translation.en: I can only imagine all the things he must have left behind.
translation.ja: きっと遺品も多いでしょうね

translation.en: I heard he had quite the collection.
translation.ja: 熱心な収集家だったと

translation.en: You want to see it?
Look at all this stuff.
Some of these items must be pretty valuable.
translation.ja: かなり貴重な物もあるはず

translation.en: Yeah, well, you can't put a price on your father's memory.
translation.ja: 思い出に値段は付けられない

translation.en: I imagine not.
That was one of his more recent finds.
translation.ja: 父が最後に発見した物よ

translation.en: I remember him talking about it.
May I?
Who are you?
- We told you. - No.
First of all,
what, were you 12 years old when he still taught that class?
translation.ja: 12歳の子に 父が教えてたって？

translation.en: And second of all, he never would've spoken very highly of me.
translation.ja: それに父が 私を自慢する訳ない

translation.en: Certainly not my mother,
so do you wanna tell me what you're really doing here?
Have you heard the rhyme about the Crooked Man?
Of course. My father wrote a book about the author.
translation.ja: ええ　父が本を書いた

translation.en: We believe it's real.
After your father died, Milo posted the means to summon him online.
translation.ja: 教授の死後 マイロが 召喚方法をネットに載せた

translation.en: Six people have died,
and unless we can figure out how to undo our mistake,
translation.ja: 過ちを正す方法を 見つけなきゃ⸺

translation.en: there will be more.
We believe this box might be the only way to stop it.
translation.ja: このオルゴールが 唯一のカギなんだ

translation.en: I'm gonna show you something.
WANTED BY POLICE NOAH HARRIS OLIVIA SHAW
Something that I have not shown anyone.
translation.ja: 今まで誰にも見せなかった

translation.en: Not the police.
But when I-- when I found my father's body in the classroom...
translation.ja: 教室で父の遺体を 見つけた時⸺

translation.en: he had this.
We can end it. For good.
translation.ja: ここで終わらせましょ

translation.en: We just need to borrow the box.
Please.
You get that son of a bitch.
Noah Harris' black SUV was reportedly seen early this morning heading north.
translation.ja: 北へ向かう黒のＳＵＶの 目撃者はいませんでした

translation.en: Harris and Olivia Shaw are being sought by police in connection with last night's brutal slaying that--
translation.ja: 昨晩の残忍な殺人事件と オリビアたちとの関連を…

translation.en: I always knew she was trouble.
I always said it.
Hey!
Not at the dinner table.
Dear Lord, bless this food that we are about to eat
translation.ja: 主よ 私たちが頂く物に祝福を

translation.en: and all that it provides.
translation.ja: 私たちが頂く物に祝福を

translation.en: - Amen. - Amen.
Looks like a storm is coming in.
Now... where were we?
- I am going to check the breakers. - No! I mean... I'll come with you.
translation.ja: ブレーカーを見てくる ダメ 私も一緒に行く

translation.en: I should get some candles.
You know, maybe it's- it's the whole block.
translation.ja: うちだけじゃないかも

translation.en: Maybe.
There's nothing there. There's nothing there.
Mother?
- Alice? - Mother, I can't open the door!
translation.ja: アリス？ ママ　ドアが開かない

translation.en: Alice!
Mother?
Mother, are you OK?
I'm scared!
Mother? Is that you?
translation.ja: ママ？　そこにいるの？

translation.en: How 'bout a light?
I should've been there.
No, you can't blame yourself.
For six years, her mother tried everything she could,
translation.ja: アリスのママは６年の間 全力を尽くして⸺

translation.en: and probably more than she should, to keep Alice safe.
Hey, she's alive.
How many people have died because of me?
translation.ja: 私のせいで何人が犠牲に？

translation.en: Jill, Steven, Mia, Charlotte, Violet.
translation.ja: ジル　スティーブン ミア　シャーロット…

translation.en: You're the one that's trying to save them.
He called my name.
What are you talking about?
Back at the house,
translation.ja: 教授の家で オルゴールに触った時⸺

translation.en: when I touched the music box, he called my name.
translation.ja: 教授の家で オルゴールに触った時⸺ 名前を呼ばれたの

translation.en: And it wasn't the first time.
This is all my fault. All of this.
translation.ja: 全部 私が原因なのよ

translation.en: - He's taunting me. - No, no, no, you can't think like that.
translation.ja: 私を… そんな風に考えるな

translation.en: No, I killed them, Noah. I killed all of them!
translation.ja: そうよ　私が皆を殺したの

translation.en: You think she can hear me? She's in a coma because of me.
translation.ja: 私のせいで アリスもこんなことに

translation.en: Don't you understand? Because of me!
Come on, let's go.
- Don't you ever turn the light off! Ever! - She's just a little tired. Excuse us.
translation.ja: 絶対に電気を消さないで 少し疲れてるんだ

translation.en: I'm the one who started it. I'm the one who needs to end it.
How?
The music box, it showed me something.
translation.ja: オルゴールから見えたの

translation.en: A crooked house. I think that's where we have to find him.
translation.ja: 歪んだ家よ そこにヤツがいる

translation.en: Did it show you where it was?
Uh... All I saw were woods.
Think.
translation.ja: 何か特徴とか 目印になる物はなかった？

translation.en: Were there any specific characteristics or landmarks? Anything specific?
translation.ja: 何か特徴とか 目印になる物はなかった？ 何でもいい

translation.en: Just a clearing.
But-- But I did notice two large rocks and giant pine tree.
translation.ja: ２つの大きい岩と マツの木が見えたわ

translation.en: As if that even helps.
translation.ja: まるでヒントみたいに

translation.en: Actually, it does.
- Come here. Come here. - What are you doing?
translation.ja: こっちへ 何？　何を…

translation.en: Let's go, let's go.
I was a cub scout when I was a kid. One day my troop went for a hike through this park.
translation.ja: 子供の頃 仲間と この公園へ探検に来た時⸺

translation.en: We found this clearing and two rocks.
translation.ja: 開けた所にある ２つの岩を見た

translation.en: Just like your vision.
You ready?
- For Alice. - For Alice.

translation.en: ♪ There was a Crooked Man ♪
♪ Who walked a crooked mile ♪
♪ He found a crooked sixpence ♪
♪ Upon a crooked stile ♪
translation.ja: 歪んだコインを見つけたとさ

translation.en: ♪ He bought a crooked cat ♪
translation.ja: 手に入れた 歪んだネコは

translation.en: ♪ Which caught a crooked mouse ♪
translation.ja: 歪んだネズミを捕まえた

translation.en: ♪ And they all lived together ♪
translation.ja: そして歪んだ小さな家で

translation.en: ♪ In a little crooked house ♪
translation.ja: そして歪んだ小さな家で 一緒に暮らしました

translation.en: Something's happening.
♪ Then came the Crooked Man ♪
translation.ja: その歪んだ歌を歌う時

translation.en: ♪ When you say his crooked rhyme ♪
♪ Down your crooked paths, he follows ♪
translation.ja: どこまでも追いかけてくるよ

translation.en: ♪ With his crooked spine ♪
♪ When he sets his crooked gaze ♪
♪ Upon your potter's field ♪
translation.ja: 君の墓へと向けられる時

translation.en: ♪ Then only with his crooked song ♪
♪ Shall the Crooked Man yield ♪
He's here.
What do you want?
Haven't you taken enough already?
Hey, hey there.

translation.en: Is it working? Anything happening?

- Are you OK? - It's not working.

translation.en: Only with this crooked song. I don't know what I'm doing wrong.

translation.en: And so the box must serve the same purpose.
